Notes: Link is to summary of Order, suspended or shared liability for penalties not available.

Description: The Department of Financial Services fined William Penn Life Insurance Company $6.3 million for engaging in improper reinsurance transactions in an effort to minimize reserves backing life insurance policies issued by the company.
Agency: New York Department of Financial Services

Description: $10,0000 fine levied for not paying the correct amount of interest on death benefits in 119 instances. RCW 48.23.300.
Agency: Washington State Office of the Insurance Commissioner

Company: William Penn Life Insurance Company of New York
Description: William Penn Life agreed to pay $110,000 in settlement of allegations it produced a non-compliant demonstration, failed to sign the demonstration, and dated the demonstration after the date of the statement of self-support.
Agency: New York Department of Financial Services
